category.name: DecisionApps.RelationBrowser
category.category_description: Preferences for Decision Apps Relation Browser.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_Sorted_Layouts
preference.preference_description: Specifies the layout mode for cells in Relation Browser. A value of true will indicate that as cells are expanded, they will be displayed in a sorted order. The only layouts available for this mode are: Top-to-Bottom, Right-to-Left, Left-to-Right, Bottom-to-Top. The default value is false.
